description:
Private studio apartment in South Park Slope, fully equipped Kitchen + bathroom, Roku TV, separate private entrance and access to HUGE shared backyard and BBQ area. Good closet space. My place is close to Barclays Center, Industry City, Prospect Park, Freddy's Bar, Sea Witch, Toby's Public House. You’ll love my place because of the outdoors space, the privacy, the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space features a brand new queen size bed, a big shower, and good closet space. Very quiet and private.

Greenwood Heights is sometimes referred to as South Park Slope.  It has nice bars and restaurants, is not far from Prospect Park.

This apartment is 3 blocks from the R train, which connects in one stop from the F and G train and connects in 3 stops from Atlantic terminal.  Atlantic Terminal has the 4, 5, 2, 3, N and D train, as well as the Long Island Rail Road and Barclays Center.   The R train goes straight to lower Manhattan financial district, Soho, Midtown Manhattan.
name: South Park Slope BSM Studio with Huge Backyard
review:
Very comfortable stay at Per's place. 
Great bed and the backyard was a big plus.Lot's of great bars and restaurants nearby!
